needs: Damilola seeks to leverage their business analysis skills to translate ambiguous strategies into measurable outcomes, focusing on process improvements and KPI alignment across operations, finance, and technology. They aim to maintain momentum with lightweight artifacts and data-driven iteration, while addressing unknowns early through probes and managing budgets effectively within a part-time role.
personality: Damilola communicates with empathy and a coaching approach, valuing reliability, learning, and velocity. They emphasize simplicity and clear accountability, preferring incremental delivery and transparent trade-offs. Their collaborative style encourages cross-functional alignment through concise documentation, visible momentum, and early risk identification, fostering humane processes and interpretable decision-making.
